movies.title: Godzilla
movies.description: Godzilla rises from the Pacific to attack Tokyo in the definitive cinematic allegory for humankind’s disregard for nature and itself.

movies.title: Godzilla Raids Again
movies.description: The spiny, ferocious kaiju Anguirus wreaks havoc on Osaka before facing Godzilla in this 1955 sequel.

movies.title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
movies.description: It's a kaiju battle for the ages as the infamous King Kong is brought to Japan for a brutal brawl with Godzilla.

movies.title: Mothra vs. Godzilla
movies.description: The mighty Mothra is summoned to stop a returning Godzilla’s rampage in the duo’s debut cinematic clash.

movies.title: Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster
movies.description: Godzilla, Rodan, and Mothra join forces to save Earth from the three-headed alien invader kaiju, King Ghidorah.

movies.title: Invasion of Astro-Monster
movies.description: While exploring Planet X, two astronauts witness attacks by the dreaded Monster Zero, launching an intergalactic battle between kaiju and humankind.

movies.title: Ebirah, Horror of the Deep
movies.description: The citizens of Letchi Island call on Godzilla and Mothra to save them from the Red Bamboo terrorist group and the crustacean kaiju, Ebirah.

movies.title: Son of Godzilla
movies.description: When secret weather-control experiments create a radioactive storm, Godzilla must rescue loveable kaiju hatchling Minilla from giant bugs.

movies.title: Destroy All Monsters
movies.description: Earth's kaiju are confined to Monster Island until alien forces cause them to break free and rampage across world capitals.

movies.title: All Monsters Attack
movies.description: A boy named Ichiro befriends Godzilla’s adopted son Minilla as they learn how to confront their respective bullies.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Hedorah
movies.description: Godzilla takes on smog monster Hedorah, a kaiju perpetuating the perils of humankind’s pollution.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Gigan
movies.description: Godzilla and Anguirus defend Earth from a space kaiju summoned by evil aliens disguised as theme park employees.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Megalon
movies.description: Jet Jaguar teams up with Godzilla in a battle to defend humankind from subterranean monster Megalon, and the returning space kaiju, Gigan.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla
movies.description: When Earth-hungry aliens unleash the robotic Mechagodzilla on humankind, only King Caesar, and Godzilla can stop it.

movies.title: Terror of Mechagodzilla
movies.description: Godzilla must once again face its alien-built metallic adversary Mechagodzilla, along with mad scientist-controlled kaiju, Titanosaurus.

movies.title: The Return of Godzilla
movies.description: A new Godzilla’s Tokyo rampage triggers world panic and the threat of nuclear war in a story evocative of the original 1954 Godzilla.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Biollante
movies.description: Misguided genetic engineering and human greed wreaks havoc as Godzilla is forced to defend Earth from plant-hybrid kaiju Biollante.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
movies.description: Godzilla confronts archnemesis King Ghidorah in a cataclysmic, time-transcending battle for the fate of Earth's future.

movies.title: Mothra vs. Godzilla
movies.description: The majestic Mothra returns to confront fellow moth Battra, along with Godzilla in this complex multi-kaiju melee.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II
movies.description: Godzilla squares off against an all-new incarnation of Mechagodzilla, the pinnacle of human engineering built to defeat the King of the Monsters.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
movies.description: Godzilla, Little Godzilla, and humankind’s mecha M.O.G.U.E.R.A battle space-born psychic monstrosity SpaceGodzilla to save Earth.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Destoroyah
movies.description: A war-weathered Godzilla and Godzilla Junior face a foe born of the aftermath of 1954’s Godzilla in an apocalyptic battle with the evil kaiju Destoroyah.

movies.title: Godzilla 2000: Millennium
movies.description: A new era begins as alien creature Orga attempts to harvest Godzilla’s DNA in a hyper-adaptive kaiju clash.

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
movies.description: When a black hole weapon releases prehistoric insects in modern Japan, humankind relies on Godzilla’s might to protect them from Megaguirus.

movies.title: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
movies.description: Godzilla battles Mothra, King Ghidorah, and Baragon as the Guardian Monsters fight to protect Japan from total annihilation.

movies.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
movies.description: Humankind confronts the King of the Monsters with a biomechanical Mechagodzilla known as Kiryu, built on the bones of the original 1954 Godzilla.

movies.title: Godzilla: Tokyo SOS
movies.description: Mechagodzilla (aka Kiryu) and Mothra team up to protect Japan from Godzilla's latest rampage, but a sacrifice must be made in order to restore peace.

movies.title: Godzilla Final Wars
movies.description: It’s the ultimate kaiju extravaganza as Godzilla battles a series of fan-favorite monsters before a decisive confrontation with a merciless new foe.

movies.title: Shin Godzilla
movies.description: An unlikely task force races to stop the metamorphic rampage of a new Godzilla before Japan is swallowed up in the process.

movies.title: Godzilla Minus One
movies.description: In postwar Japan, a new terror rises; Godzilla. Will the devastated people be able to survive... let alone fight back?
